mapper.select: SELECT no, coffee, kind, price, DATE_FORMAT(reg_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS reg_day, DATE_FORMAT(mod_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS mod_day FROM coffee_menu;
SELECT no, coffee, kind, price, DATE_FORMAT(reg_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS reg_day, DATE_FORMAT(mod_day,'%Y.%m.%d') AS mod_day FROM coffee_menu where no = #{strNo}
mapper.update: update coffee_menu set price = CAST(#{strPrice} as INTEGER) where no = CAST(#{strNo} as INTEGER)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log (coffee_no, price) VALUES (#{strNo}, CAST(#{strPrice} as INTEGER))
